headline: Otis Worldwide Corporation (OTIS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Otis Worldwide Corporation (OTIS) on Librarian Capital’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on OTIS. Otis Worldwide Corporation (OTIS)’s share was trading at $95.16 as of 29th May. OTIS’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.91 and 23.53 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Otis Worldwide (OTIS) remains […]
